reviewText: This looks like it's very interesting.  That's why I figure it's probably worth at least 4 stars.  BUT --- what a shame that it's 'WAY too over-priced to bother with.  I'll be watching for it to show up again at a FAIR price!

I saw this on the History Channel some years ago. UFO researcher Robert Goerman tracked down the real Carlos Miguel Allende and discovered the truth about the Philadelphia experiment. Pretty much debunked the whole thing. One of the best, if not the BEST, programs the History Channel ever made concerning a controversial topic. They actually did there homework on this one.
